commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: What's coming up next?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: It's probably got something to do with that box further inside. Nothing could be more of a red flag than that.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'll have you take on a certain test of courage here.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I have a bad feeling about this...

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I can totally imagine what's coming up...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: There's a wicker basket over there, one that is said to have an evil spirit sealed within it. The seal is unstable, so the evil spirit could pop out at any time.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I want you to place this paper talisman on the basket to seal the evil spirit in before it leaps out.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: A basket? I knew something terrifying was coming up. Nuh-uh, I don't wanna do this.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: The lid of the basket is gonna open up the moment we place the paper talisman on it, isn't it? Urgh, I'd really rather not.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Th-That's a no from me as well!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I'm honestly pretty reluctant to do that myself.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I suppose that leaves me as the only person left. I can mentally prepare myself if I know when the jump scare is going to happen.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I will do it. Please give me the paper talisman.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Here you go. Good luck.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: While I have readied myself for the task, it is quite hard to actually go ahead with it now that the time has arrived.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Umi, it's totally gonna be one of those things where the basket shakes and then a spirit pops out from inside of it.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: P-Please stop scaring me!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Whimper* Just watching you makes me nervous.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Be careful, Umi!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: H-Here I go! There! Sealed!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Huh? Nothing's happening?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Don't tell me it was all hype and no bite?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: If nothing is going to happen then I will not be complaining about that. Now let us push ahe—

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: EEEEK!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Wh-What is it?!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Look at the c-ceiling! And the walls! Th-There are eyes all over!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: GAAAAAAHHHHHHH!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Projection mapping.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You have put an unreasonable amount of effort into this!
